ca.ualberta.controllers
Class TagGalleryController

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.controllers.SCController
      ca.ualberta.controllers.TagGalleryController

public class TagGalleryController
extends SCController

Implementation of the SCController interface. Acts as the controller between the PhotoGalleryActivity and the persistence layer. Provides methods to retrieve all photo entries with a particular tag, and can delete photo entry objects so far.

Field Summary
static int DELETE_ENTRY
          Message code which tells the controller to delete a particular PhotoEntry object
static int DELETE_TAG_AND_PHOTOS
          Message code which tells the controller to delete a particular PhotoEntry object
static int GET_PHOTOS_COUNT
          Message code which tells the controller to retrieve a count of how many photos are in the database.
static int GET_TAGS
          Message code that tells controller retrieve all the PhotoEntry objects with a particular tag.
static int UPDATED_ENTRIES
          Message code that tells the controller to notify all associated message handlers that the mPhotos list has changed.
 
Constructor Summary
TagGalleryController(java.util.ArrayList<TagGroup> tags)
          Instantiates a new PhotoGalleryController with a list of PhotoEntry objects that will act as the shared 'model' between the PhotoGalleryActivity and PhotoGalleryGridAdapter, and also the name of the tag to display.

Constructor Detail

TagGalleryController

public TagGalleryController(java.util.ArrayList<TagGroup> tags)
Instantiates a new PhotoGalleryController with a list of PhotoEntry objects that will act as the shared 'model' between the PhotoGalleryActivity and PhotoGalleryGridAdapter, and also the name of the tag to display.

Parameters:
photos - ArrayList containing the PhotoEntry objects. This array acts as the 'model' in this case.
Method Detail

dispose

public void dispose()
Description copied from class: SCController
Method will be called when the controller is to be destroyed. Basically what will happen is here is disposing of any HandlerThread objects.

getAllTags

public void getAllTags()
Creates/Refreshes, from the database, the controller's list of PhotoEntry objects. Notifies any handlers that the list has been updated.

handleMessage

public boolean handleMessage(int what,
                             java.lang.Object data)
Responds to messages, and calls appropriate method to deal with the message.

Returns:
Whether or not the message was handled. A controller does not necessarily have to handle every message that is sent to it. It can ignore a message.
